code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{useRecoilValue}from"recoil";import{format}from"../../libs/parse";import Table from"../../components/Table";import{useListedAssets}from"../../database/assets";import{infoQuery}from"../../database/info";var Pool=function Pool(){var listed=useListedAssets("listed");var info=useRecoilValue(infoQuery);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Table,{columns:[{key:"symbol",title:"Ticker",bold:true},{key:"name",title:"Underlying Name"},{key:"ust",title:"UST",render:function render(value){return format(value,"UST",{integer:true});},align:"right"},{key:"asset",title:"Asset",render:function render(value,_ref){var symbol=_ref.symbol;return format(value,symbol,{integer:true});},align:"right"},{key:"price",title:"Price",render:function render(value){return"".concat(format(value)," UST");},align:"right"},{key:"total",title:"Total",render:function render(value){return format(value,"UST",{integer:true});},align:"right"}],dataSource:listed.map(function(_ref2){var token=_ref2.token;return info[token];})});};export default Pool;
